explanation: A card cannot simultaneously be scoped OWN and ANY for the same effect; choose one or model separate effects.
fix_strategy: Route to unknowns_queue if both detected; patch or refine extractor to split effects.

explanation: Equivalence classes must evaluate true against the card's primitives/facets per their required_primitives_logic; otherwise drift occurred.
fix_strategy: Re-run derivation; audit patches that add equiv classes without base primitives.

explanation: Casting from exile implies a cast event. Ensure cast_event facet is set when cast_from_zone is EXILE.
fix_strategy: Add cast_event facet or adjust extractor to set both.

explanation: Deprecated IDs should not be newly assigned (except legacy snapshots). Prefer replaced_by IDs.
